original: intros u l H. unfold is_lim_seq in *. intros eps. pose proof (filterlim_Rabs l) as Habs. apply Habs in H. destruct H as [N HN]. exists N. intros n Hn. specialize (HN n Hn). unfold Rbar_abs. destruct l. - simpl in *. unfold R_dist in *. rewrite Rabs_minus_sym. apply HN. - destruct (u n); simpl; lra. - destruct (u n); simpl; lra.
